com.buession.core.serializer

接口 Serializer

  • 所有已知子接口:
    ByteArraySerializer, JsonSerializer
    所有已知实现类:
    AbstractByteArraySerializer, AbstractJsonSerializer, AbstractSerializer, DefaultByteArraySerializer, FastJsonJsonSerializer, GsonJsonSerializer, JacksonJsonSerializer

    public interface Serializer
    作者:
    Yong.Teng

    • 方法详细资料

      • serialize

        <V> String serialize(V object)
              throws SerializerException
        将对象序列化为字符串
        类型参数:
        V - 待序列化对象类型
        参数:
        object - 待序列化对象
        返回:
        序列化后的字符串
        抛出:
        SerializerException - 序列化异常
